name: Before The After
description:
Before The After (by David Irimia & Daniel Hristescu) is an escape-room-like game where you play as a soul stuck in the afterlife of the Great Passing. In the afterworld, you will play out the lore of the Romanian purgatory as told by folklore stories.

Combine cards, talk to the various divine beings, and, instead of escaping, your goal is to venture deeper until your soul has lost all resemblance to its past life.

Walkthrough: 

Zone 1: Click on the knife

Zone 2: Knife to Dog, then Click on the bridge

Zone 3:

- Click on the old lady multiple times, until she gives you her hair pin

- Hair Pin to Knife to create a Pick Lock

- Pick Lock to House

- Pick up the coin

- Rope to Cauldron

- Cauldron with rope to Well

- Click on the bottle and wait for the cutscene

Zone 4:

- Coin to Merchant

- Click on the flute

- Flute to Campfire to create a Torch

- Torch to Dog to get rid of it

- Sign to Campfire to create another Torch

- Torch to Mist

- Cloth to Cliff
